title: Trump meddles in Georgia race to get candidate to back his 2020 falsehoods - CNN
content:
1. Trump meddles in Georgia race to get candidate to back his 2020 falsehoods  CNN
  2. Trump, Trump, Trump: Perdueâ€™s campaign hinges on former president  Atlanta Journal Constitution
  3. David Perdue stops in Alpharetta on campaign trail for governor  11Alive
  4. Perdue campaign ad highlights Trump endorsement | Politics | northwestgeorgianews.com  Rome News-Tribune
  5. Sen. Perdue gets big endorsement  FOX 5 Atlanta
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Former President Donald Trump has offered Georgia gubernatorial hopeful Vernon Jones his endorsement in a congressional contest if Jones agrees to exit the GOP primary for governor to instead run for Congress, according to two people familiar with the matter, both of whom said Trump's behind-the-scenes maneuvering is meant to bolster former Sen. David Perdue's challenge to incumbent Republican Gov. Brian Kemp.
